title: Apocalyptic Amnesty
desc:
Post 369
- In addition to the next player, you may divide 3 more instances of this card's <:impact:1106704414225485894> effect among any other players, but you can't target the same player more than thrice.
- All players who draw cards due to this card's <:impact:1106704414225485894> effect also have the next special effect of a card they play halved and rounded down.
